turn.0: ELI5: How Going Vegan Will Save The Environment
turn.1: Every point you make against industrial farming agriculture is another point against animal agriculture. The simple matter is that the majority of the world's land is used to grow food for livestock animals. No change in farming agriculture would amount to the improvement that ceasing to grow food for animals would yield.
turn.2: It takes 1 acre of land to produce enough vegetables for a month worth of eating, or cattle for a year.
turn.4: Have you ever raised your own garden? Links are one thing, experience is another. Between the wildlife and weather you loose about 45% of your corps.
turn.5: Lol it's called technology? Do you think that marijuana growers lose 45% of their crops? GTFO
